details: This charming house offers 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 modern bathrooms. With 1800 square feet of living space, it provides ample room for a growing family. Conveniently located on XYZ Street in CityA, it is close to hospitals, schools, colleges, and supermarkets. The hospital is just a mile away, while schools and colleges are within half a mile. A supermarket is also conveniently located just 0.3 miles away.
